'''''"Infinitesimal"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. 

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Eroding Avatar of Lava|text="Infinitesimal" &mdash; A Fiery Stone Gathers No Moss}} while completing challenge conditions.
